channel.title: Tricks on Often Bearing Metaphoric Tense

item.title: Copy Paste in URxvt Clipboard!
item.description:
If you’re using Rxvt Unicode as a terminal emulator, chances are while doing copy paste with Ctrl+Shift+C or Ctrl+Shift+V, you need to use the perl clipboard module

If you put the module in the right path /usr/lib<arch>/urxvt/perl/ or the user director and still couldn’t the get the clipboard functioning properly, then make sure that xsel package is installed in your system. It isn’t default in most systems (tested on Ubuntu, Debian & OpenSUSE so far) and will save you from pulling some hair
